text: hananimkkeseo haneul-e issneun geos gwa ttangsog-e issneun modeun geos-i neohuie ge yuyonghadolog hayeoss-eumyeo geubun-ui eunhyeleul boige ttoneun boiji anhge neohuileul wihae wanseonghasyeoss-eum-eul neohuineun alji moshaneunyo salamdeul jung-eneun ji sigdo eobsgo indo bad-eumdo eobs-i geuli go geudeul-eul gyohwasikineun seongseodo eobs i hananim-e gwanhayeo nonjaenghaneunjaga issdeola
